name: local-file-mcp
description: A minimal MCP server exposing file-system tools for LLMs.

tools.description: List files and folders under the configured root
Read a file's content. Returns UTF-8 text or base64 for binary
Create or overwrite a file. Accepts JSON with `path`, `content`, `encoding`
Upload a binary file via multipart form to a target path
Delete a file or empty directory
